## Introduction

```{r}
library(pastecs)
library(tidyverse)
library(kableExtra)

options(scipen=100)
options(digits=3)

DIL_1 <- read.csv2('data/DIL_1.csv', header=TRUE, stringsAsFactors=FALSE, sep=";", dec=",", row.names="Dosisname")



as_tibble(DIL_1)


DIL_1 <- DIL_1 %>% 
  select(D_60, Mittelwert, D_99, D_95, D_1, D_max, D_min)

df <- data.frame(DIL_1)

as_tibble(stat.desc(df))

#df %>% add_column('Descriptive statistics' = 1:14)

stat.desc(df)


as_tibble(stat.desc(df))

#rownames_to_column(DIL_1, var = "var_name") Versuch die 1. Spalte zu benennen
kable(stat.desc(df))
```
